description: On Aug. 15, Chinese astronauts Chen Dong and Wang Jie completed a 6.5-hour spacewalk to strengthen the Tiangong space station’s defenses against orbital debris. Working outside the station, they installed new protective panels and inspected external systems. The mission marked Chen Dong’s sixth career EVA—the most by a Chinese astronaut—and the third for Shenzhou 20’s crew. China’s space agency stressed that debris mitigation is a global concern, aligning with its policies on de-orbiting old spacecraft and passivating rocket stages. Experts warn that rising orbital traffic makes international cooperation essential.
title: Chinese Astronauts Strengthen Tiangong’s Defenses Against Space Debris

description: One of the most anticipated series is back with its new season. Fallout returns with season 2 this december as Lucy, Maximum, and The Ghoul embarks on a journey to New Vegas. This season Lucy will uncover hidden truths about her family and their connection with world’s devastation. Watch Soon.
title: Fallout Season 2 OTT Release Date Revealed: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: An international team of astronomers has discovered WD 0525+526, an unusual white dwarf about 128 light-years away, using NASA’s Hubble Space Telescope. Unlike typical white dwarfs, this star formed through a stellar merger and shows an unexpectedly high carbon content. With a mass of 1.2 Suns and a scorching surface temperature of 21,000 K, the discovery suggests that such merger remnants may be more common than previously thought. Researchers believe these hidden stellar histories could reshape our understanding of white dwarf binaries and pathways to supernova explosions.
title: Hubble Discovers White Dwarf Merger Remnant with Unusual Carbon Signature

description: Superman 2025, directed by James Gunn and starring David Corenswet, lands on Prime Video (Rent) and BookMyShow Stream in India from August 26, 2025. Following its theatrical release on July 11, the superhero film will now be available online with multiple language options. Fans can either rent it  or buy it . The star-studded cast includes Rachel Brosnahan, Nicholas Hoult, and Bradley Cooper.
title: James Gunn’s Superman OTT Release Date in India Reportedly Revealed

description: A team in China has unveiled a lithium battery design with over 600 Wh/kg energy density—double that of Tesla’s best batteries. If scalable, the breakthrough could revolutionise electric vehicles, extend driving ranges, and improve safety. Researchers caution that it remains a proof-of-concept requiring more real-world testing before mass adoption.
title: New Battery Tech May Double EV Range and Safety, Researchers in China Claim

description: Bungie CEO Pete Parsons announced Thursday that he was leaving the studio after over two decades. Parsons, who led the company since 2015, will be replaced by Bungie’s chief development officer Justin Truman.
title: Bungie CEO Pete Parsons Is Leaving the Studio After Two Decades Amidst Restructuring

description: Motorola will launch the Razr 60 and Moto Buds Loop with Swarovski crystals in India on September 1, which will be available via Flipkart. The Swarovski-studded models are part of The Brilliant Collection, already introduced in limited quantities globally. Teasers suggest they will come in the Pantone Ice Melt shade, matching the global versions. In India, the standard Razr 60 costs Rs. 49,999 for 8GB + 256GB, offered in three finishes. The Brilliant Collection models are expected to retain the same features as the regular versions.
title: Motorola Razr 60, Buds Loop Brilliant Collection With Swarovski Crystals to Launch in India on September 1

description: Oppo F31 series is expected to debut soon in India. Ahead of its speculated launch, a tipster has shared key specifications of one of the three handsets in the upcoming lineup. The series is said to include the standard Oppo F31, F31 Pro, and F31 Pro+. The Oppo F31 Pro+ is said to be powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 SoC, paired with a 7,000mAh battery pack. The lineup is said to come with slight upgrades over the Oppo F29 series.
title: Oppo F31 Series Tipped to Launch in India Soon; Oppo F31 Pro+ Said to Feature 7,000mAh Battery

description: Oppo Reno 14 5G and Reno 14 Pro 5G were recently launched. The Pro variant is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 8450 chipset, coupled with a 6,200mAh battery. Now, the company could be preparing to launch its purported successor, the Oppo Reno 15 series. The leaks for the phones have been surfacing online for a while. The smartphone maker is said to launch a compact variant as part of the lineup, too.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series Reportedly in Testing; Series Said to Include Three Models With Flat Displays

description: Red Magic 11 Pro allegedly appeared on the Geekbench website with a Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 chipset. This high-end SoC will be announced next month at the Snapdragon Summit. The listing also suggests the Android 16 operating system and 16GB RAM on the Red Magic 11 Pro.
title: Red Magic 11 Pro With Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 Chipset Appears on Geekbench, Could Launch Soon

description: Rockstar Games has announced the 'End of Summer' giveaway. Anyone who plays GTA Online between August 21 and September 17 will be eligible to receive an infusion of GTA$1 million. GTA+ subscribers can also claim an additional GTA$1 million as part of the benefits. Apart from this, there are also discounts on several in-game vehicles.
title: GTA Online Players Can Claim GTA$1 Million Cash As Part of Rockstar’s ‘End of Summer’ Giveaway

description: Honor Magic 7, along with Magic 7 Pro, was unveiled in China in October 2024. The two phones are powered by the octa-core Snapdragon 8 Elite chips, coupled with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of internal storage. The leaks regarding the specifications of its rumoured successor, the Honor Magic 8 series, have been surfacing online for a while. Now, a tipster has revealed the tentative China launch timeline of the upcoming Honor lineup.
title: Honor Magic 8 Series Launch Timeline Leaked, Two Models Said to Debut First

description: Itel Zeno 20 has been launched in India as the brand’s latest entry-level smartphone. Powered by an octa core Unisoc T7100 processor, it comes with up to 4GB RAM and 128GB storage. The device sports a 6.6-inch display. From pricing to availability and specifications, here's everything you need to know about the Itel Zeno 20.
title: Itel Zeno 20 With Unisoc T7100 Chip, 5,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE is expected to be unveiled soon. Ahead of its launch, the key specifications of the upcoming ‘Fan Edition’ handset have been leaked online, suggesting that the phone could sport a 6.7-inch display. The phone is said to pack a 4,900mAh battery with 45W fast charging support. It could succeed the Samsung Galaxy S24 FE, which was launched in September 2024.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Specifications Tipped Ahead of Launch; Said to Feature 4,900mAh Battery

description: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 Diamond Edition has been launched in China, priced at CNY 6,999 (roughly Rs. 85,200) for the sole 12GB + 512GB model. The limited edition clamshell foldable features a Cupid-cut lab-grown diamond in the middle frame with NGTC certification, along with a crocodile-grain Kona leather back and a metal Xiaomi nameplate. It is available in Cherry Red and Glacier White shades via Xiaomi’s China website. Other than the design changes, its specifications remain the same as the standard Mix Flip 2 introduced in June 2025.
title: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 Diamond Edition Refreshed With Embedded Lab-Grown Diamond

description: Bitcoin traded near $113,500 on Thursday, August 22, and is almost 8 percent down this month, while Ether rose by 2-3 percent to $4,280. Analysts said ETF flows, inflation worries, and a $13.8 billion options expiry act as major factors shaping sentiment. While Jerome Powell’s Jackson Hole speech is due today, traders are weighing whether crypto stabilises at its current levels or gears up for a breakthrough.
title: Bitcoin Stands at $113,000, Ether Holds $4,280 Amidst ETF Flows, Inflation Risks

description: Blinkit founder and CEO Albinder Dhindsa announced that the platform now delivers powered eyeglasses from Lenskart in just 10 minutes. Customers don’t need a prescription to order. They can select lens power from preset options ranging from minus 0.25 to minus 1.5, choose their preferred colour, and check out via the Blinkit app. The service is currently available in Delhi NCR, Bengaluru, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kolkata, and Mumbai, with plans to expand to more regions across India soon.
title: Blinkit Partners Lenskart for Quick Deliveries of Powered Spectacles in Select Cities

description: Coolie, is a gangster thriller directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj and starring Rajnikanth. Deva, who earned daily wages, now runs a hostel-style mansion. His life takes a twist when Rajshekar dies under suspicious circumstances. As Deva digs deeper, he finds that the reason for his death is a criminal syndicate led by ruthless kingpin Simon Xavier. Deva sees a past connection with him as the tale moves forward, and what happens next is something to watch.
title: Coolie OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed Online: When and Where to Watch Rajnikanth Starrer Movie Online?

description: A new leak has pointed to the possible setting of the next Forza Horizon game. According to a now deleted post on social media, the Forza Horizon team was scanning Kei cars for the next entry in the franchise, which suggests Forza Horizon 6 could head to Japan.
title: Forza Horizon 6 Could Feature Japan as Its Setting, New Leak Suggests

description: Huawei will host its “Ride the Wind” product launch event on September 19 to launch the Watch GT 6 series. The lineup is expected to include the standard Huawei Watch GT 6 and Huawei Watch GT 6 Pro models. The brand is confirmed to launch new smartphones and tablets during the launch event.
title: Huawei Watch GT6 Series Global Launch Date Confirmed; New Devices to Be Unveiled in Paris

description: Jio users can claim a three-month free JioSaavn Pro Individual subscription via the MyJio App until August 31. To redeem, users must open the app’s Offers Store, tap the “JioSaavn Pro – 3 Months Free” banner, and generate a code to use on the JioSaavn app or website. The offer excludes existing subscribers and cannot be combined with other discounts.
title: Jio Offers Free 3-Month JioSaavn Pro Subscription to Prepaid, Postpaid Customers

description: Kajol’s Maa is a mythological horror thriller directed by Vishal Furia, produced by Ajay Devgn and Jio Studios. Released theatrically on June 27, 2025, the film streams worldwide on Netflix from August 22. Featuring Kajol as Ambika, the movie blends supernatural horror with maternal courage and goddess-inspired strength.
title: Maa, Starring Kajol, Now Available for Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know

description: Maalik is an intense action movie, starring Rajkumar Rao as an ordinary man who rises to power in Allahabad in the 1980s. The film blends social norms and issues, and uniquely blends action and adventure. The movie is now available for rent on Amazon Prime.
title: Maalik Now Available for Rent on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know About Rajkumar Rao Starrer Movie

description: Elon Musk tried to enlist rival Mark Zuckerberg for the $97.4 billion bid that his consortium made for OpenAI earlier this year, but the CEO of Meta Platforms did not come on board, OpenAI said in a court filing on Thursday.
title: Musk Sought Zuckerberg Help for OpenAI Bid, Court Filing Shows

description: OnePlus Ace 6 and an unnamed Realme phone are rumoured to be in development. Both of the purported handsets are speculated to launch in China sometime in October. Although details remain under wraps, leaks have given us a good idea of what to expect. The latest rumour coming out of China suggests that both the OnePlus Ace 6 and the Realme phone will feature batteries with an 8,000mAh capacity, or even higher.
title: OnePlus Ace 6, Upcoming Realme Phone Tipped to Get 8,000mAh Batteries Ahead of October Launch

description: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ could launch soon in markets outside China. The specifications of the global variant are believed to be identical to its Chinese counterpart, with a few exceptions. The global version could pack a slightly smaller battery. It could miss out the 50-megapixel telephoto camera with 2.5x optical zoom.
title: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ Global Variant to Launch With Different Battery, Camera Specifications, Tipster Claims

description: Samsung is expected to take the wraps off its tri-fold smartphone later this year. It is likely to debut as the Galaxy Z Tri-Fold. As per a report, the handset will get some exclusive features, powered by One UI 8.It will support running up to three apps simultaneously, along with an updated cover screen mirroring experience.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Tri-Fold Will Reportedly Allow You to Run Three Apps Simultaneously With One UI 8

description: An Apple Watch helped a 57-year-old woman in the UK to be diagnosed with a brain tumour, after her smartwatch alerted her about her low heart rate. Here's how repeated low heart rate alerts from an Apple Watch helped doctors discover a previously undiagnosed tumour.
title: Apple Watch Heart Rate Alerts Reportedly Help Detect Woman's Undiagnosed Brain Tumour

description: Google next smart home speaker, teased at the Google Pixel 10 launch event, is expected to launch in four colours, including green, black Porcelain, and a red shade. It may debut by October or next spring with the Pixel 10a. The speaker reportedly resembles a bulkier HomePod Mini with a bottom light ring and fabric finish. Powered by Gemini, it will likely support Gemini Live, natural voices, media search, automations, and sound detection. It may also pair with Google TV for surround sound and act as a Matter hub.
title: Google's Gemini-Powered Smart Speaker Likely to Launch Soon in Four Colourways: Report

description: The Online Gaming Bill, 2025 was recently passed by Parliament, and real money gaming platforms like Dream11 and MPL have reportedly begun to halt their RMG-related operations in the country. While users may still have access to games not requiring money deposits, thanks to the new law that prohibits online money gaming services but allowse-sports and other social games.
title: Online Gaming Bill 2025: Real Money Gaming Platforms Reportedly Wind Down Some Online Games

description: OpenAI will open its first office in India’s New Delhi by the end of this year, announced a company executive. The executive has also provided statistics to justify the company’s latest decision. With a single employee in the country at the moment, the AI first plans to hire more people for its upcoming New Delhi office.
title: OpenAI Begins Hiring Ahead of Plans to Open First Office in India by 2025-End

description: Vodafone Idea (Vi) has announced that it has started rolling out its 5G services to a new city in Maharashtra. With the new addition, the third-largest Indian telecom service provider (TSP) is now offering 5G connectivity in five cities of Maharashtra. This comes as the TSP is looking to expand its 5G coverage in India to 23 cities, including 17 priority circles. The telecom company has also announced an introductory offer for its subscribers in Pune.
title: Vodafone Idea (Vi) Rolls Out 5G Services in Pune With Introductory Offers

description: After years of wait, Hollow Knight: Silksong finally has a release date. The Metroidvania action platformer is launching across PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S/X, Nintendo Switch, and Switch 2 on September 4. It will also be available on Xbox Game Pass.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Will Release on September 4, Developer Team Cherry Confirms

description: Dream11 is reportedly shutting down its real-money gaming operations in India as the Parliament passes the new Online Gaming Bill, 2025. The new law seeks to regulate how online games, which involve real money, function in India. It seeks to ban advertisements of real-money games (RMG) while creating a regulatory framework for e-sports in India. Additionally, Zupee, the online RMG Ludo app, is no longer available on the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
title: Online Gaming Bill 2025: Real Money Gaming Platforms Reportedly Shut Down Operations

description: The Vivo T4 Pro is all set to be launched in India. Before its debut on August 26, the company has teased details about the camera system on the upcoming handset. It will sport a triple rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary camera featuring a Sony lens and support for optical image stabilisation. It will also have a 50-megapixel Sony 3X periscope telephoto lens, along with an unspecified third sensor.
title: Vivo T4 Pro Camera Details Revealed Ahead of India Launch; to Offer 3X Periscope Zoom

description: WhatsApp is reportedly working on a new feature that will allow users to leave a voice message when a call isn't answered. The upcoming feature is currently available for some beta testers. It has been spotted in WhatsApp for Android beta version 2.25.23.21, which is available via the Google Play Beta programme.
title: WhatsApp Begins Testing Record Voice Message Feature for Unanswered Calls on Latest Beta

description: YouTube Music is commemorating its 10th anniversary by releasing several new features. The music streaming platform was launched in 2015, and since then, it, combined with YouTube Premium, has amassed more than 125 million subscribers globally. To mark this milestone, YouTube Music will soon let users comment on albums and playlists to converse about the music they love with others. Further, it is also bringing taste match playlists for connecting over shared music tastes.
title: YouTube Music Rolls Out Comments on Albums, Taste Match Playlists to Commemorate 10th Anniversary

description: Honor has launched the Magic V Flip 2 in China with a 5,500mAh battery, the largest in a clamshell foldable yet. It features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chip, up to 16GB RAM, a 200-megapixel main camera with a 50-megapixel ultrawide shooter, a 6.82-inch LTPO OLED foldable display, and a 4-inch cover screen. It succeeds the Magic V Flip, which had a 4,310mAh battery.
title: Honor Magic V Flip 2 Launched With 5,500mAh Battery, 200-Megapixel Main Camera: Price, Specifications

description: WhatsApp has started testing a new menu option that makes it easier to select multiple messages. Unlike the simpler long press to select method on Android, the current iOS process is slightly more cumbersome. This update simplifies it, allowing users to select multiple messages more intuitively.
title: WhatsApp Tests Multiple Message Selection on iOS, Making It Easier to Select and Copy Messages

description: Apple is raising the prices of the monthly Apple TV+ subscription, the company announced on Thursday. The Cupertino-based tech giant’s streaming service will become 30 percent more expensive for subscribers in the US and other affected international markets. The updated pricing is now reflected on the Apple TV+ platform, which now costs $12.99 (roughly Rs. 1,130) per month.
title: Apple TV+ Gets 30 Percent More Expensive for Subscribers in the US, Select Other Markets

description: Samsung has been rumoured to shake up its 2026 flagship Galaxy S-series by replacing the standard and Plus variants with Galaxy S26 Pro and Galaxy S26 Edge. While details remain under wraps, new information has come to light about which processors these handsets could use. As per a report, both of them could be powered by the unannounced 2nm Exynos 2600 SoC. This is said to be due to rising chip procurement costs incurred by Samsung.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro, Galaxy S26 Edge Could Reportedly Be Powered by Exynos 2600 Chip
